title: Senior Financial Accountant
text:
Vacancy Details

Financial Accountant



This is a great opportunity for an articled accountant who is passionate about doing good. This role is with a well-established NGO who is looking for a Senior Financial Accountant to join their team.



Responsibilities:



Prepare monthly and annual reports



Coordinate and prepare for internal and external audits



Annual budgets and quarterly forecasts



Intercompany trasactions



Monitor and control working capital



Cash flow management and forecasts



Banking and treasury function



Asset management



Annual tax calculations, preparations and submissions



Guide and manage employees



Requirements:



Completed SAICA articles



3 years minimum experience after articles



** Please note that only successful candidates will be contacted





Companies may expire jobs at their own discretion.

If you have not received a response within two weeks, your application was most likely unsuccessful.
